items.name: Logitech Optical Mouse
items.description: The New Logitech Optical Mouse with ergonomic design has built-in sensors to allow you to scroll from anywhere. That's right.

items.name: Samsung Curved UHD 80''
items.description: The Samsung Curved UHD Smart TV comes with the new price bracket to prove you surely evade taxes to afford such a thing. Have fun running from the government with an 80 inch TV. Bet they won't see that.
